title: Installation issue: python@3.7.4
body:
I was successfully able to install python@3.7.4 with compiler gcc@4.8.5 and gcc@8.1.0, but it fails when I try with the most up-to-date gcc@9.2.0.

---

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install python@3.7.4
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> diffutils is already installed in /home/dror/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-ppc64le/gcc-9.2.0/diffutils-3.7-2frmp5xpdubyliy34wydaiexik4qhdrp
```
[...]
```console
==> sqlite is already installed in /home/dror/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-ppc64le/gcc-9.2.0/sqlite-3.28.0-mqfz3kfnzyc4mvx2phpy7jgphvnzb4py
==> Installing python
==> Searching for binary cache of python
==> No binary for python found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /home/dror/spack/var/spack/cache/python/python-3.7.4.tgz
==> Staging archive: /tmp/spack-stage/dror/python-3.7.4-dujvqglywu2slghaagqybsp7qforsiz6/Python-3.7.4.tgz
==> Created stage in /tmp/spack-stage/dror/python-3.7.4-dujvqglywu2slghaagqybsp7qforsiz6
==> Ran patch() for python
==> Building python [AutotoolsPackage]

==> Executing phase: 'configure'

==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

             aagqybsp7qforsiz6/spack-src/spack-build CC='/home/dror/spack/lib/s
             pack/env/gcc/gcc -pthread' LDSHARED='/home/dror/spack/lib/spack/en
             v/gcc/gcc -pthread -shared -L/home/dror/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel
             7-ppc64le/gcc-9.2.0/sqlite-3.28.0-mqfz3kfnzyc4mvx2phpy7jgphvnzb4py
             /lib -L/home/dror/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-ppc64le/gcc-9.2.0/nc
             urses-6.1-o3nuwd2kgcbrobajmxsq4fuhus6krfrt/lib -L/home/dror/spack/
             opt/spack/linux-rhel7-ppc64le/gcc-9.2.0/expat-2.2.5-oacoskrsq5ksp5

             1-tqoaod74myz3abbtm6xhmvsfps7jdz5u/lib64 -L/home/dror/spack/opt/sp

             ghbkowwkhdgf7/lib -L/home/dror/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-ppc64le

             -hb3obu2w2y23zpv3lqrzuh56ofum37vd/lib   ' OPT='-DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv
              -O3 -Wall'        _TCLTK_INCLUDES='' _TCLTK_LIBS=''       ./python -E /tmp/s
             pack-stage/dror/python-3.7.4-dujvqglywu2slghaagqybsp7qforsiz6/spac
             k-src/setup.py   --no-user-cfg build
     898     running build
     899     running build_ext

     901     building '_struct' extension

             spack/linux-rhel7-ppc64le/gcc-4.8.5/readline-7.0-saf6z7uchqyykwtai
             xttbfhr2qc3zgb6/include -I/home/dror/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-p
             pc64le/gcc-4.8.5/gdbm-1.18.1-qstr2ltko3dz3m3fsati3ynvwhkdbsqt/incl

             p2-1.0.8-o3sdu6rpqilyfbezqx4f6qnghnjlxfio/include -I/home/dror/spa
             ck/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-ppc64le/gcc-4.8.5/zlib-1.2.11-4v3ticyykh2
             xcgw5fzltjrfuxkx7ipqh/include -I/home/dror/spack/opt/spack/linux-r
             hel7-ppc64le/gcc-4.8.5/openssl-1.1.1c-z225fw73fpylz4jd7um4oxpdyhza
             mijc/include -I/home/dror/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-ppc64le/gcc-

             /usr/local/include -I/tmp/spack-stage/dror/python-3.7.4-qb4enrozlh
             hujedrkioxidykwicugvu7/spack-src/Include -I/tmp/spack-stage/dror/p
             ython-3.7.4-dujvqglywu2slghaagqybsp7qforsiz6/spack-src/spack-build
              -c _struct.c -o build/temp.linux-ppc64le-3.7/_struct.o
  >> 903     gcc: error: _struct.c: No such file or directory
  >> 904     gcc: fatal error: no input files
     905     compilation terminated.
     906     building '_ctypes_test' extension

```

```console
  >> 1247    gcc: error: _ctypes/_ctypes.c: No such file or directory

     1249    compilation terminated.

             or the module's name.

     ...

     1289    Could not build the ssl module!
     1290    Python requires an OpenSSL 1.0.2 or 1.1 compatible libssl with X50
             9_VERIFY_PARAM_set1_host().

             s://github.com/libressl-portable/portable/issues/381

  >> 1295    error: file '/tmp/spack-stage/dror/python-3.7.4-qb4enrozlhhujedrki
             oxidykwicugvu7/spack-src/Tools/scripts/pydoc3' does not exist
  >> 1296    make: *** [sharedmods] Error 1

See build log for details:
  /tmp/spack-stage/dror/python-3.7.4-dujvqglywu2slghaagqybsp7qforsiz6/spack-build-out.txt
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux tellico-compute0 4.14.0-115.10.1.el7a.ppc64le #1 SMP Wed Jun 26 09:32:17 UTC 2019 ppc64le ppc64le ppc64le GNU/Linux

$ cat /etc/redhat-release 
Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 7.6 (Maipo)

$ spack compilers
==> Available compilers
-- gcc rhel7-ppc64le --------------------------------------------
gcc@9.2.0  gcc@8.1.0  gcc@4.8.5
```
